infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Magician_Prima: Increase the skillgainspeed by‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，increase the repairspeed by‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ 。
infotexts.talentname.Talents_Magician_Primary03: Who still cant't fly in the ocean?
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Magician_Prima: Increase the swimming speed by‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖，and reduce the damage taken by‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ 。
Gain‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖more exp when destroying nests ,shipping cargos,transfer personels or hunting missions was completed，and if none of your crew died,gain‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖more exp

When using‖color:gui.yellow‖Base mentsl or precious mentaal‖end‖to refine element bottle，there is a chance of‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖to gain double product，and has a chance of‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖to get triple product。If you finished a round with none of your crew died you will gain one‖color:gui.orange‖Base mental‖end‖。

Increase your swimmingspeed walkingspeed firingrate and damage you made by‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖base on your current magic skill。This enhancement will reach to maximum when your magic skill is‖color:gui.green‖400‖end‖
Increase your damage to nonehunman by‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖，reduce your damage to frendly units by‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖。

Increase your flowResistance by‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖，add‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖more of your maximumhealth，unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Youkai-Busting Buckshot‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Youkai-Busting Pellets‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Banquet: Recover all your crew's part of‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage，burn，bleeding,bloodloss and skillloss‖end‖when you finished a round with nobody died。
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Hermit: You will have a chance of‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖to reduce‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖of the damage taken when hurt，this effect has a cool down time of‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.Enter_Gensokyo: Gain‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖of reiki disorder resistance，When your‖color:gui.orange‖Magic Skill‖end‖is below‖color:gui.green‖70‖end‖but above‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖，provide a bonus of‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖points on all of your skills(only the oringinal five)；When above‖color:gui.green‖70‖end‖，provide a bonus of‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖points。
infotexts.talentdescription.Izakaya: Gain‖color:gui.green‖80%‖end‖drunk resistance，when being attacked,temporarily improve‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖burn and bleeding resistance.Unlock recepies:‖color:gui.orange‖Beer,Friendship juice‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Un: Gain‖color:gui.green‖1.5‖end‖points of all skills(includng magic skill)，give the rest of your crew‖color:gui.green‖0.5‖end‖point，provide extra effect on‖color:gui.yellow‖Magician/Mahō Shōjo's Outfit +‖end‖.Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Gensokyo Diving Suit‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Spell_Card_Recycle_Unl: Increase the sellingprice of element bottle by‖color:gui.green‖75%‖end‖，Increase your‖color:gui.orange‖physical damage and burn resistance on your hand‖end‖by‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖，Unlock recepies：Recycle‖color:gui.orange‖Sun,Moon Spell Card‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Magic_Breakthrough: Increase the quantity of all the items you craft by‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖level more，Increase‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖level more if what you craft is:Patchouli +/Marisa's Outfit +/Flandre +/Alice's Outfit +
infotexts.talentdescription.Foul_Potion_Unlocked: Increase the crafting speed of magic material by‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，Increase the effect of poison by‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖，Unock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Filthy Potion‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Buff: Prolong the duration of enhance buff by‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖，Gain‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖more poison resistance。
infotexts.talentdescription.Hermes: Increase your damage,movingspeed,physical resistance by‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖，Unlock recepie：‖color:gui.orange‖Philosopher's Stone‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Traveling_Magician: You will gain one‖color:gui.orange‖《Magic:Foots in the door》‖end‖if you finished a round with none of your crew died，Increase the speed of gaining skills for all your crew that below the level of 6 by‖color:gui.orange‖20%‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Release: Provide different enhancement base on your current magic skill： level‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖：After your magic skill is above‖color:gui.green‖60‖end‖，Have a chance of‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖to cause‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖extra damage on every attack level‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖：After your magic skill is above‖color:gui.green‖80‖end‖，Increase your Remote Danmaku's damage by‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ level‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖：After your magic skill is above‖color:gui.green‖120‖end‖，Gain‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖seconds of pressure immune when in water，The rest duration of this effect will start to recover as soon as you get back to‖color:gui.red‖Dry Land‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Convergence: Provide different enhancement base on your level： After your level is above‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖：Provide‖color:gui.green‖3%‖end‖ more ‖color:gui.orange‖ skillgainspeed ‖end‖and‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ more ‖color:gui.orange‖expgainspeed‖end‖ per level until level ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ After your level is above‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖：Provide‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖ more ‖color:gui.orange‖ swimmingspeed ‖end‖ and reduce ‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖‖color:gui.orange‖ Dual-Wielding Penalty ‖end‖ per level until level ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ After your level is above‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖：Increase your ‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖ maximumhealth ‖end‖ per level, with a upper limit of‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖，and this effect will be removed if you died
infotexts.talentdescription.Power_Point_Efficient_: You can accept one more mission in every round，increase the reputation you earned by‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖.You can drag other person in full speed.Unlock recepies:‖color:gui.orange‖:P dot(can be fabricated effectivly)‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.MEID_Unlocked: The more enemy around you,the higher damage you made，with a maximum of‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖,After your health is below‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，you will gain double of this effect。Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖MEID‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Oriental Origin Bullet‖end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Gensokyo_Divinggea: Reduce friendly fire by 15%，Increase your damage made from five elements by 15%
Reduce friendly fire by 15%，Gain minor enhancement on all your skills especially magic skill。
Reduce friendly fire by 15%，Increase your maximumhealth by 10% depend on your corresponding magic skill。With a maximum of 30%
Reduce friendly fire by 15%，When controling dolls，increase 20% of your physical damage and burn resistance，and your will be harder to be noticed by enenmies。
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yousei_Primary: Gain extra‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖of exp and a piece of ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Of Yokai（Apple Flavour）‖end‖ after you completed at least a mission in a round.
Gain‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ more of the ‖color:gui.orange‖skillgaining speed‖end‖，Increase‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖movementspeed‖end‖.

Gain‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ more of the ‖color:gui.orange‖movementspeed‖end‖, and increase your resistance for ‖color:gui.orange‖Hypoxia‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖，reduce your friendly fire damage by‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.

Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，When your health is above‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，Increase your ‖color:gui.orange‖Repairspeed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖，and your will gain one extra ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Of Yokai（Peach Flavour）‖end‖ if you finished at least one mission in a round.
Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of your swimmingspeed，Gain ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ more of the exp you earned.

When your sub is attacked，your ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖ will increase by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ and your ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖ will increase by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ in ‖color:gui.green‖6‖end‖ seconds.

Gain one ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Of Yokai（Lemon Flavour）‖end‖ after you completed at least one mission in a round，Increase your hands' ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖，Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Shell of Candy，Cannon of Candy‖end‖

You will gain Incident Energy as long as you completed at least one mission in a round，which will provide a maximum of increase in your ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackSpeed‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Damage‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Burn Resistance‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖。Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Mutated Candy‖end‖

Take the average of the skill levels in pairs, and obtain a corresponding bonus based on ‖color:gui.green‖8%‖end‖ of the average value： ‖color:gui.yellow‖HelmSkill+WeaponsSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖MechanicalSkill+ElectricalSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖RepairSpeed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖MedicalSkill+MagicSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖ The increasement of the enhancement given by MagicSkill will stop when reach ‖color:gui.green‖400‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Candy_Fun: When you finished at least one mission in a round，you will gain a ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Of Yokai（Grapefruit Flavour）‖end‖，You can get different kinds of positive buffs that last for ‖color:gui.green‖150‖end‖ seconds by using Candies in your health pad： ‖color:gui.yellow‖Apple Flavour‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖Extreme speed‖end‖ increase ‖color:gui.green‖150 points‖end‖； ‖color:gui.yellow‖Peach Flavour‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖ increase by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖； ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lemon Flavour‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖AttackSpeed‖end‖ increase by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖； ‖color:gui.yellow‖Grapefruit Flavour‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖ increase by‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Insouciance: If there aren't any hostile enemies around you,then your ‖color:gui.yellow‖Physical Damage, Burn and Bleeding‖end‖ will be quickly recovered.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Emergency_Avoid: If there are more than ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ hostile enemies and且your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖ increase by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Faintness Resistance‖end‖ increase by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Lone_Yousei: If there are not any of your crews nearby，Increase the effect given by meds by‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖，Increase the resistance of ‖color:gui.yellow‖debuff‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Candy_World: Improve the quality of the item you craft ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ level more,Gain all four kinds of Candies if you completed at least one mission in a round，Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Cannon Plus，Big Shell Of Candy，Super Candy‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yousei_Alliance: When you're on Yousei's ‖color:gui.orange‖Outfit +‖end‖，Increase the corresponding effect given by outfits by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Behind_The_Mutation: Have a chance of ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ to add ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ points of your Mutation Energy when you killed a creature，When Mutation Energy is above ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖，gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖； When Mutation Energy is above‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖，Gain‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ more of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Burn Resistance‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Cute_Prank: Have a chance of ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ to increase ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ points of your Mutation Energy when you killed a creature，When Mutation Energy is above ‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your maximumhealth，increase the firing rate of the barbette by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Eastern_And_Little_Nat: When Mutation Energy is above ‖color:gui.green‖40‖end‖ points，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖，reduce ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ points of your skill level。 Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Ice Sword Of The Warrior，Torch Of Hell，The Three Fairies' Triple Heavy Crossbow‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Magical_Assista: If there is a magician on broad，provide her with extra ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖，gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of money
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Self_Made: If you completed at least one mission in a round，you will get a ‖color:gui.orange‖Bas Mental‖end‖，If nobody died，gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ exp
infotexts.talentdescription.Quiet_And_Well_Behaved: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖RepairSpeed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，this effect will be applied on the magician in your crew
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vibrant: You will not die because of disease if you are in a room with a magician
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Further_Study: Increase the efficiency of the fabricator and deconstrutor by‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，Increase the speed of crafting meds by‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Child_Of_Nature: Gain all four kinds of Candies after every round，After your Mutation Energy is above ‖color:gui.green‖60‖end‖，Gain ‖color:gui.yellow‖Revel Magic‖end‖ effect。 Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Essence Of Candy‖end‖。 Essence Of Candy will allow Yousei to accuire five of the weakened talent of Magician（including the three Ultimate talents）。Gain extra enhancement when you unlocked all five talents：Inprove the quality of what you craft to ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ level more，Reduce the speed of the natural decrease of the Mutation Energy by‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖
infotexts.talentname.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Unlocked_: Fantasy Entry - The Son of Nature
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Un: Gain ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ points of all skills includng magic skill when finished a round。

infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yokai_Primary0: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of skillgainspeed，When your health is above‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖，double this effect

Gain extra exp by completing different kinds of missions： ‖color:gui.orange‖Shipping Cargo、Mining‖end‖：‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖； ‖color:gui.orange‖Recover cargo、Transport Personels missions‖end‖：‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖； ‖color:gui.orange‖Killing Mosters、Cleaning Nests‖end‖：‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖； ‖color:gui.orange‖Cleaning Ruins、Scanning Ruins‖end‖：‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖； ‖color:gui.orange‖Repair Becons、Killing Pirates、Abandond Stations‖end‖：‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖
Gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖4%‖end‖ of money for your mission bonus，If ‖color:gui.red‖nobody died‖end‖ ，gain an extra of ‖color:gui.green‖4%‖end‖。

Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical and Eletrical RepairSpeed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖RepairSpeed‖end‖。After your level is above‖color:gui.green‖8‖end‖，double this effect.
Reduce ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of the damage to human hostiles.
Reduce‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of the damage to none human hostiles.
Reduce‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，reduce the damage to friendly units by‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖。

Reduce‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of the damage of all types（including‖color:gui.orange‖Explosion Damage‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Turret Damage‖end‖）。
Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖，Gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ in the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Open Ocean‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yokai_Primary1: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖，double this effect if there are other creatures around you.
Increase all ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillLevel‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of your FlowResistance.

If you have the lowest level among your crew，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖ExpgainSpeed‖end‖ If your level is not below ‖color:gui.green‖12‖end‖，give all of your crew ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Burn Resistance‖end‖‖end‖
After completing ‖color:gui.red‖All Missions‖end‖，gain ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ blood bag。If there is a death，gain extra‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖.

Increase the quality of what you craft to‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ level more。Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Compass of Life‖end‖。You can collect ‖color:gui.red‖Fear‖end‖ by using it on dead hostiles。

Everytime you kill a creature，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ point of count。If the source of the mutation count is not max,gain 100 counts immediately.provide different effect base on different level of count： ‖color:gui.green‖160‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖。Increase the ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Resistance‖end‖ on your hand by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.green‖320‖end‖：Slightly increase the recover of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Physical damage、Bleeding‖end‖。If there is one of your crews unconcious，you may drag characters in full speed。 ‖color:gui.green‖480‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖
infotexts.talentname.Talents_Yokai_Primary16: When the tide rises, all boats float higher
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yokai_Primary1: According to the ‖color:gui.orange‖skilllevel's‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖to give different effect，The enhancement will stop when reach‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖： ‖color:gui.yellow‖HelmSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖WeaponsSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeDamage‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖MedicalSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖BuffDuration‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖ElectricalSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖RangedAttackSpeed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖MechanicalSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeAttackSpeed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖MagicSkill‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖

infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Yaoguai: You can't unlock other branches if you choose this branch。Corresponding Character：‖color:gui.orange‖Kazami Yuuka，Houjuu Nue，Kawashiro Nitori，Kuminode Koishi，Yakumo Yukari‖end‖

infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Yaoshou: You can't unlock other branches if you choose this branch。Corresponding Character：‖color:gui.orange‖Komano Aunn，Reisen Udongein Inaba‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Tiangou: You can't unlock other branches if you choose this branch。Corresponding Character：‖color:gui.orange‖Aya Shameimaru，Inubashiri Momiji‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Tianren_X: You can't unlock other branches if you choose this branch。Corresponding Character：‖color:gui.orange‖Hinanawi Tenshi‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yokai_Talents_L: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖。Last talent of the branch，when you unlocked it，‖color:gui.red‖the rest of the branches will be unable to unlock‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Youling_Wanglin: Slightly reduce the monster's‖color:gui.orange‖Detection Range‖end‖ to you，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖。 When been attacked，you will cause ‖color:gui.yellow‖Frezzing and Mental illness‖end‖ to whom attacked you，which has a cool down time of ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ seconds。
Do more damage to ‖color:gui.red‖Weak‖end‖ hostiles，with a maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖

For enemies who have more ‖color:gui.red‖Rest Of The Health‖end‖，the higher the penetration of the armor，with a maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Youmu Outfit +‖end‖：Do extra ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ of the damage to ‖color:gui.red‖Enemies with Full Health‖end‖，gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ armor piercing。When attacking enemies with the buff of ‖color:gui.orange‖Disappear Of Thoughts‖end‖,he will have a effect of ‖color:gui.orange‖Slow‖end‖。

When your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖，Temporarily increase ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Burn Resistance‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖‖Youmu Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ points of ‖color:gui.orange‖WeaponsSkill‖end‖。

After you killed any creatures，Temporarily increase your ‖color:gui.orange‖Faintness Resistance‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖‖Youmu Outfit +‖end‖：After you killed any creatures，Temporarily increase your ‖color:gui.orange‖Debuff Resistance‖end‖

Depend on your ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ to enhance other skills，This effect will reach to maximum when your magic skill is above ‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖‖Youmu Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeDamage‖end‖，Depend on your ‖color:gui.orange‖WeaponsSkill‖end‖，improve ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖

when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖‖Youmu Outfit +‖end‖：Once a round，when your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖ you will stay concious for ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖seconds，increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillLevel‖end‖。 If you kill a creature in ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ seconds，prolongs ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ second of duration。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai01: The effectiveness of the drug treatment improve by‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖。If you're not attacked in a while，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖，reduce ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the damage taken。remove this effect when attacked。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai02: Do extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ damage to human。You will be harder to be discovered when Squat down。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai03: Increase‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage and Burn Resistance‖end‖，Slightly inrease your ‖color:gui.orange‖Mental Illness‖end‖ when being attacked。 The higher the ‖color:gui.orange‖Mental Illness‖end‖ is，the lower ‖color:gui.orange‖This Effect‖end‖，with a lowest of‖color:gui.green‖3%‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai04: If there'er no crew around you，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed、AttackDamage、Debuff Resistance‖end‖。Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Moonquake，Moonquake Epicenter‖end‖。If a Yokai possesses ‖color:gui.orange‖Moonquake‖end‖，can also trigger the exclusive weapon effects corresponding to the branch's outfit.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai05: Whe your level is above ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖，you will be immune to pressure。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yuka's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，those creatures which are weak will leave you when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nue's Outfit +‖end‖：Attach the effect of ‖color:gui.yellow‖The Nightmare of Eternal Slumber‖end‖ to your attack。When killed a target，there will be an exploation around its body，Cause all creatures within a small area to be affected by ‖color:gui.yellow‖The Nightmare of Eternal Slumber‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nitori's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase the rate of injury recovery in water.，Gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Bleeding and Burn Resistance‖end‖ when in water when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Komeiji's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖。If you're not ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unconcious‖end‖，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yakumo's Outfit +‖end‖：Gain permanent ‖color:gui.green‖50%（300/600）‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Speed‖end‖。Has a chance of ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ on every attack to reduce ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ of the damage taken
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai06: Slowly reduce your ‖color:gui.orange‖Mental illness‖end‖。When you have run for a while，slightly increase the damage of your next attack。It will have a cool down time of ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖ seconds after that。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yuka's Outfit +‖end‖：Significantly increase the effect of all the flowers when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nue's Outfit +‖end‖：After you completed all four stages of counts，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackSpeed‖end‖。Be immune to ‖color:gui.orange‖Nightmares of eternal slumber and ancient sorrow and terror‖end‖。Improve the quality of your craft by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ level more when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nitori's Outfit +‖end‖：Gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Electrical、Mechanical RepairSpeed and RepairSpeed‖end‖。When your health is above 50%‖end‖时，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damaga Resistance‖end‖，otherwise increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Komeiji's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillLevel‖end‖。You will not affected by ‖color:gui.orange‖Flow‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖SwimmingSpeed‖end‖ increase by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yakumo's Outfit +‖end‖：‖color:gui.orange‖SwimmingSpeed‖end‖ increase by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，If you completed a around with nobody died，Gain some enhancement that last for a round：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai07: when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yuka's Outfit +‖end‖：Significantly increase the recoverspeed of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bleeding‖end‖，Depend on ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your current ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖to increase ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeAttack Damage、MovementSpeed‖end‖。This effect will reach to maximum when your ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ is above‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nue's Outfit +‖end‖：When ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖80‖end‖，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖。Do extra ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ damage to enemies whose health is below 50% when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nitori's Outfit +‖end‖：Reduce ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Fuel Consumption of the Reactor‖end‖。When ‖color:gui.orange‖MechanicalSkill‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖80‖end‖，increase‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Turrent Damage‖end‖，reduce ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Energy Consumption of the turrent‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ efficiency of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Reactor and Water Pump‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Komeiji's Outfit +‖end‖：Depend on ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ to improve ‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeAttack Damage‖end‖,which will reach to maximum when ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖。Do extra ‖color:gui.green‖25.7%‖end‖ of damage to the enemies with its health below ‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yakumo's Outfit +‖end‖：If not attacked in ‖color:gui.green‖120‖end‖ seconds，with your health above ‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖，get a effect of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Hidden‖end‖。‖color:gui.yellow‖Hidden‖end‖ will make it harder for you to be discovered。Unock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Key to the Unity of Surface and Reverse‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire01: Increase your ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillLevel‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖，when using ‖color:gui.orange‖Blood Bag/High quality Blood Bag‖end‖，heal extra ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bleeding‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire02: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖BloodLoss Resistance‖end‖，Gain extra ‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖ damage of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Burn and Bleeding‖end‖。Has a chance of ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ to covert ‖color:gui.yellow‖Burn‖end‖ to ‖color:gui.yellow‖Gnaw‖end‖ as a multiplier of ‖color:gui.green‖120%‖end‖。 Depend on ‖color:gui.red‖CharacterLevel‖end‖ to reduce the‖color:gui.orange‖Debuff Duration‖end‖，reduce ‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖ on every level，with a maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire03: Increase your ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bleeding‖end‖ damage by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖。Increase ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bleeding and BloodLoss‖end‖ to human by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖。Do more damage to the enemies with higher ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bleeding‖end‖，with a maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire04: ‖color:gui.orange‖RangeAttack Speed‖end‖、‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeAttack Speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖ increase by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖，this effect will be weakened by 50% if you're in water。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖、‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Burn Resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Burn Resistance‖end‖，when your health is above ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖Mental Illness Resistance‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Skillgain Speed‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire05: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Debuff Resistance and Posion Resistance‖end‖。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia's Outfit +‖end‖：Immune to common ‖color:gui.orange‖Alien Infection‖end‖，including ‖color:gui.red‖Husk Symbiote‖end‖。When your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖， Temporarily improve ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre's Outfit +‖end‖：Significantly increase the recover speed of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Gnaw or Bite‖end‖。When ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖100‖end‖，Increase ‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖MedicalSkill‖end‖。Depend on your ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ to increase ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖。It will reach to maximum when your ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire06: Become immune to ‖color:gui.yellow‖Wound Infection‖end‖。After you killed any creature，has a chance of ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ to cure your ‖color:gui.yellow‖Burn and Gnaw‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia's Outfit +‖end‖：After using ‖color:gui.orange‖High Quality B Type Blood‖end‖，gain extra bleeding damage by ‖color:gui.green‖66.6%‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of you ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖。Improve the quality of your craft to ‖color:gui.green‖+1‖end‖。You will also have the effect of ‖color:gui.orange‖High Quality B Type Blood‖end‖：Provide the effect of ‖color:gui.orange‖Speed、Slow metabolism and Active‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire07: when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia's Outfit +‖end‖：Depend on ‖color:gui.orange‖Character's Level‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖ on each level，maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖。Significantly improve the single effect of ‖color:gui.orange‖High Quality B Type Blood‖end‖。When your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖，you will stay alive until ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ seconds later，this can be used only once a round。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre's Outfit +‖end‖：Do extra ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ damage of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Burn,Laceration and Visceral injury‖end‖ to the enemies with its health above‖color:gui.green‖49.5%‖end‖。After your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖，you will stay awake for ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖seconds，This can be triggered only once a round
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoshou_Shouren: When there're your crews around you，significantly increase the recoverspeed of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bleeding and BloodLoss‖end‖

Increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖，gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Bite and Gnaw Resistance‖end‖。Increase the damage caused by ‖color:gui.yellow‖Gnaw‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖
Become the protected target by small animals。After your level is above ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖SkillLevel‖end‖ increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖

Attach some ‖color:gui.yellow‖Gnaw‖end‖ damage to your MeleeAttack。Do extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of damage to the enemies with its health below‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Komano's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖。Improve the effect of ‖color:gui.yellow‖“Lion”‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen'a Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖。When running，reduce the damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖

Increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Mental Illness‖end‖，significantly increase the recoverspeed of‖color:gui.yellow‖Illusion‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Komano's Outfit +‖end‖：When accuired Skill point，gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖0.5‖end‖ points。Improve ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖ for the crew around you. when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen'a Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖ExpgainSpeed‖end‖，improve ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.yellow‖Faintness Resistance‖end‖

Depend on your ‖color:gui.orange‖Character's Level‖end‖ to increase your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ per level，maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Komano's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of damage to human。Grant different effects based on character level： Level ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖：You can drag creatures in full speed. Level ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Hypoxia Resistance‖end‖ Level ‖color:gui.green‖25‖end‖：You will not become a target to hostiles if unconcious. when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen'a Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖RangeAttack Damage‖end‖，gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of range attack barrage，do extra ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.yellow‖ShotWound‖end‖。

when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Komano's Outfit +‖end‖：You take ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ reduced damage as long as there are other crew members alive around you. when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen'a Outfit +‖end‖：When health is above ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，do ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ more damage，when health is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.yellow‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.yellow‖Burn Resistance‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou01: Gain positive effect intead of negetive effect when drunk，reduce ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the damage taken。Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Tengu Dance‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou02: Reduce damage to friendly units by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖。When there're some of your crews unconcious，increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Debuff Resistance‖end‖，improve the effect of the meds applied yourself by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou04: gain extra ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of reputation，reduce the loss of reputation by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖。Character levels provide different effects upon leveling up： Level ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackSpeed‖end‖ Level ‖color:gui.green‖18‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖ Level ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SwimmingSpeed‖end‖ Level ‖color:gui.green‖22‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the mission bonus. Level ‖color:gui.green‖25‖end‖：Has a chance of ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ on each attack to reduce ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ of the damage taken.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou05: If your level is lower than the highest level among the crew members for more than ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ level，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖，otherwise,increase‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage and Burn Resistance‖end‖。Unlock recepies：‖color:gui.orange‖Tengu's Token‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Iku Nagae's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖SwimmingSpeed‖end‖。Everytime you gei into a new station，increase ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ of this count。When it reach ‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage MovementSpeed and Faintness Resistance‖end‖。Zero this count after you died. when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Inubashiri Momiji's Outfit +‖end‖：Depend on your ‖color:gui.orange‖WeaponsSkill‖end‖，improve ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your corresponding ‖color:gui.orange‖SwimmingSpeed and BuffDuration‖end‖。This effect will reach to maximum when your ‖color:gui.orange‖WeaponsSkill‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou06: After your submarine is attacked，increase your ‖color:gui.orange‖Turrent Firing Rate‖end‖ temporarily by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ for a while。This effect has a cool down time of ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ minutes。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Iku Nagae's Outfit +‖end‖：When there're some of your crews around you，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackSpeed‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Inubashiri Momiji's Outfit +‖end‖：When there're some of your crews around you，do extra ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of damage to the enemies with its health below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou07: when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Iku Nagae's Outfit +‖end‖：Depend on your current level，increase ‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖ per level，maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖。When your level is above ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖，gain extra‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Inubashiri Momiji's Outfit +‖end‖：Depend on your current level，increase ‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeAttack Damage‖end‖ per level，maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖。When your level is above ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖，reduce ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the damage taken。
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tianren_Xianren: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖Faintness Resistance‖end‖。When your level is below ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖-50%‖end‖。Otherwise your ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖-150%‖end‖

Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Poision Resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖Debuff Resistance‖end‖。If your level is lower than that of the highest-ranking crew member for more than ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ levels，increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillgainSpeed‖end‖。 Otherwise increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖SkillLevel‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖

When attacked，give the source of attack ‖color:gui.green‖8‖end‖ seconds of debuff：Reduce ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed and AttackSpeed‖end‖ as well as ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Burn Resistance‖end‖。This effect has a cool down time of ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖ seconds

When you're in full health，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖MovementSpeed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖RepairSpeed‖end‖。When your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖Hypoxia Resistance‖end‖。When you level is above ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖，reduce the damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖

After you killed any creatures，gain all skill ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ more point。This effect can trigger at most ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ times per round。 when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Hinanawi's Outfit +‖end‖：After completing all the missions in a round，gain ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ count。When it reach to ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖，increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of the ‖color:gui.orange‖MeleeAttack Speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical Damage Resistance‖end‖。The count is reset upon death.

Allow the limitation of your skilllevel breach ‖color:gui.green‖100‖end‖ to ‖color:gui.green‖200‖end‖ when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Hinanawi's Outfit +‖end‖：According to the level of you character，increase ‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackSpeed‖end‖ per level，maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖

when wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Hinanawi's Outfit +‖end‖：Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖AttackDamage‖end‖。According to your ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖，improve ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖MaximumHealth‖end‖。This effect will reach to maximum when your ‖color:gui.orange‖MagicSkill‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖
